features.featureTitle: Create new square, cleanly-cropped branding images from the user-uploaded logo photos (IMG_20260208_024007233-8.jpg, IMG_20260208_024007233-9.jpg, IMG_20260208_024007233-10.jpg, IMG_20260208_024007233-11.jpg) and add them as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated. The crop should center the circular school emblem, remove surrounding phone/background borders, and ensure the emblem is fully visible with a small safe padding for maskable icon use.

Update the PWA/browser icon metadata to use the newly generated app icon assets by updating references in frontend/index.html and frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest (replace current references to /assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v4.dim_192x192.png and /assets/generated/pkm-app-icon-2026-v4.dim_512x512.png).

Replace the two selected in-app logo image elements with the newly provided logo by updating the centralized branding logoPath (frontend/src/constants/branding.ts) so that the Header logo image (/html/body/div/div/header/div/div/img[1]) and the Home hero logo image (/html/body/div/div/main/div/div/div[2]/div/img[1]) render the updated logo asset via BRANDING.logoPath.
